## Logger.setSensFields() method

Set sensitive fields that need to be masked in logs.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setSensFields(fields: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fields | string\[\] | Array of field names to be marked as sensitive |

**Returns:**

void
